Posts.Content: NeedtobeSTRONG wrote: I am So excited that tomorrow is the last Chemo part of my treatment.  For all of you ladies having a difficult time and feel like you can not keep going!!  Keep putting one foot in front of the other.  We are so much Stronger then we think!  I am looking so foward to tomorrow I think I may be up all night between the adreniline and the steroids. hehe but I am not complaing this time.  I am lucky my sister in law is taking my 2 girls from wed unill Sunday this way I can just rest.  God Bless her!  4 girls ages 4,6,7,8 for 4 days....  We will owe her big time after this. Dx 9/14/2011, IDC, 5cm, Stage IIIC, Grade 3, 15/36 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: LAST TC part of my TCH Tomorrow. NeedtobeSTRONG financegirl

Posts.Content: NeedtobeSTRONG wrote: Why is it so difficult. I was dx in sept finished with chemo and rads just have herceptin through October. I will be having my part 2 of reconstruction on Aug 3rd. I was offered a great RN position within the agency I work for. I had just completed nursing school and had gotten my license a month before I was diagnosed so my career was on hold. I am so excited and extremely lucky this opportunity has been dropped on my lap. BUT I AM SO SCARED to move foward! The what if's...... But this is what I want so bad. It will help us get a bigger place and be more comfortable money wise. And I will be ale to gain great clinical nursing experience. I can not pass it p and have to give HR an answer tomorrow. Why am I so torn.....it has to be fear! Dx 9/14/2011, IDC, 5cm, Stage IIIC, Grade 3, 15/36 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Moving foward. NeedtobeSTRONG lotusbloomsinmud

Posts.Content: NeedtobeSTRONG wrote: Getting so nervous have not worked since October. Mostly nervous about the looks I feel like I will get. I am not going to wear the wig. (was not for me) I may even got without a hat since the hair is coming in. But mostly nervous as this is the first big stepp back into life as I knew it. Hoping is goes well. I have gotten used to being a little laid back and not always on the go. Was enjoying my quiet cup of coffee after putting the kids on the bus. Dx 9/14/2011, IDC, 5cm, Stage IIIC, Grade 3, 15/36 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: My last weekend before going back to work. NeedtobeSTRONG LaurenM730
